segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of frustration watching that woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is she so oblivious to the chaos unfolding in her kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing right in front of her, yet she seems lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a mess waiting to happen, and she just doesn’t see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glance at the boy on the stool, and my heart drops with worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching out his hand to that cookie jar, completely unaware of the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting at an angle that just screams danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his sister stands there, practically begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout out a warning, but I know I’m just a silent observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s maddening how they’re sneaking around, stealing cookies without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR
